main event: Over a period of about 3 hours, observers sighted a phenomenon around 35 times, described as flashes of light covering limited portions of the sky that disappeared in 1 to 2 seconds.
interesting points: The flashes of light were observed about 35 times in total during the night., Witnesses reported that the flashes would appear suddenly and were silent., Several witnesses including a youth counselor were present during the sightings., The phenomena were described as having various shapes, with one instance noting it appeared almost like a basketball size object., The report is associated with Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO sightings from 1947 to 1969.
sighted object: flashes of light in the sky
witness description: a youth counselor and a friend
